summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.2°C) and outside temperature (down 2.8°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 271 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1736 m), feels like temperature (up 6.0°C), outside temperature (up 4.8°C), and inside temperature (up 1.9°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, air moisture should feel ok. Chance of light rain, occasional overcast conditions, and it’s dim outside. Weather could become unsettled.
